SEARCH
Package cn.nukkit.network.connection

Class BedrockPeer

java.lang.Object
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
cn.nukkit.network.connection.BedrockPeer
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler
public class BedrockPeer extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
A Bedrock peer that represents a single network connection to the remote peer. It can hold one or more BedrockSessions.

  • Nested Class Summary
